CustomField.description: This field refers to Timsheet Header title. This gives complete information of Timesheet Header on a glance.
CustomField.formula: "Timesheet for "+ SVMXC__User__r.FirstName +" "+ SVMXC__User__r.LastName + " (" + text(SVMXC__Start_Date__c) +" to " + text(SVMXC__End_Date__c) +")"
CustomField.label: Title
